original: Nakusalaṁ nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na hīnam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nakusalaṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na majjhimam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa pe āsevane sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa

original: Nakusalaṁ napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na paṇītam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam na micchatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na sammatta niyatam dhamma

original: paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (sabbattha sattarasa. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na kusalam na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca sabbattha sattarasa vipākam natthi

original: Nakusalaṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na magga hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na magga adhipatim dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ naanuppannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nauppādiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na anuppannam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na auppādim dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ naatītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naanāgataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na atītam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na anāgatam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta nu

original: Nakusalaṁ naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na ajjhattam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na bahiddhā dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na bahiddha ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
